about_the_game:
Fill out your stories and dialog even further with Vol 9 of Japanese Anime Voices: Female Character Series. Following the first eight voice packs, this pack will expand your project with more exciting and fun Japanese female anime voices speaking very usable Japanese phrases!

Picking up where Vol 8 left off, this one offers more common, everyday phrases useful for game dialog. Go ahead and give your female players even more things to chat about and expand their dialog!

FEATURES:

* 126 Japanese animation-like female voices (phrases)
* OGG, M4A formats included
* Female voices (in Japanese phrases) for Visual Novel Games, RPG and much more!
* English translation list included
* For use in RPG Maker VX Ace or the engines of your choice!

Tracklist:

001_Start1.wav いくぞー！ LET'S GO!
2 002_Start2.wav やってやる！ I'll do it!
3 003_Victory1.wav ボクの勝ち～♪ I WON! ♪
4 004_Victory2.wav ふふーん！朝飯前だったぞ！ HMMM! It was a piece of cake!
5 005_Follow1.wav ボクに任せな！ Leave it to me!
6 006_Follow2.wav わかった！ All right!
7 007_Choice1.wav 次はどうする？ What's next?
8 008_Choice2.wav 指示をちょうだい！ Give me directions!
9 009_Runaway1.wav 逃げるぞぉ！ LET'S RUN AWAY!
10 010_Runaway2.wav ひえー！逃げろー！ Whoa! Run!
11 011_Tool use1.wav これを使うぞ I'm going to use this.
12 012_Tool use2.wav そらよ THAT'S IT.
13 013_Healthy turn1.wav どうしようかな？ What should I do?
14 014_Healthy turn2.wav ボクの番だぞ！ It's my turn!
15 015_Dying turn1.wav あうう、まずいぞ… Oh, no...
16 016_Dying turn2.wav きついかも… MAYBE IT'S HARD...
17 017_Abnormal state turn1.wav うぅ… UH...
18 018_Abnormal state turn2.wav クラクラする… DIZZY...
19 019_Unable to fight1.wav くっ、くそう… DAMN, DAMN...
20 020_Unable to fight2.wav まだ、やれるのに… I can still do it...
21 021_Damage1.wav うっ UH...
22 022_Damage2.wav くっ KUH!
23 023_Damage3.wav いたっ OW!
24 024_Damage4.wav んっ HMM...
25 025_Damage5.wav わっ WHOA!
26 026_Large damage1.wav いったあ！ Ouch!
27 027_Large damage2.wav うわああ！ Wow!
28 028_Large damage3.wav ぐうう！ UGH!
29 029_Large damage4.wav きゃあ！ EEK!
30 030_Large damage5.wav ひぎぃ！ Higi!
31 031_No damage1.wav そんなもの！ That's it!
32 032_No damage2.wav 効かないよーだ！ It doesn't work!
33 033_Weak attack1.wav ふっ HMPH!
34 034_Weak attack2.wav やっ YAY!
35 035_Weak attack3.wav ほっ HO
36 036_Weak attack4.wav はっ HAH!
37 037_Weak attack5.wav せいっ SHUT UP!
38 038_Medium attack1.wav えいっ！ WHAT!?
39 039_Medium attack2.wav おりゃ！ Holy moly!
40 040_Medium attack3.wav せいやっ！ Come on!
41 041_Medium attack4.wav はぁー！ SIGH!
42 042_Medium attack5.wav それえ！ That's it!
43 043_Strong attack1.wav 隙だらけだぞ！ What a gap!
44 044_Strong attack2.wav くーらえー！ GEEZ!
45 045_Strong attack3.wav うりゃあああ URAAAH!
46 046_Strong attack4.wav これでどうだー！ HOW ABOUT THIS!?
47 047_Strong attack5.wav ボクの本気を、受けてみろー！ Take my word for it!
48 048_Recover1.wav 大丈夫か？ Are you all right?
49 049_Recover2.wav ボヤッとするな！ Don't be silly!
50 050_Recover3.wav 援護するぞ！ I'll back you up!

76 076_Anger2.wav ああん！？ HUH?!

81 081_Satisfaction1.wav いいなあ！ How nice!
82 082_Satisfaction2.wav むふーん！ MMM!
83 083_Shy1.wav へへへ… HEH HEH HEH...
84 084_Shy2.wav むふ、むふふ MU-FU!
85 085_Surprise1.wav うわっ！？ WHOA!?
86 086_Surprise2.wav なんだなんだ！？ WHAT THE HELL!?
87 087_Laugh1.wav ふっふーん！ HMPH!
88 088_Laugh2.wav はははっ！ HAHAHA!
89 089_Bitter smile1.wav あ、あはは… AHAHA...
90 090_Bitter smile2.wav そ、そっか… I SEE...
91 091_Grin1.wav へぇ～？ HUH?
92 092_Grin2.wav ほ～～～ん？ HMM?
93 093_Weep1.wav ううっくぅっ SOB... SOB...

97 097_Praise1.wav やるじゃん！ Good for you!

99 099_Apologize1.wav ご、ごめん… S-SORRY...

101 101_Amazed1.wav やれやれ… GEEZ...

106 106_Request2.wav たのむな！ Don't ask!

108 108_Hello2.wav どーも THANK YOU.
109 109_Call1.wav おーい HEY!
110 110_Call2.wav なぁ HEY...
111 111_Call strongly1.wav おい！ Hey!
112 112_Call strongly2.wav 待ちやがれ！ Wait!
113 113_Watch out1.wav っ！ OH!

116 116_Hold2.wav んっしょ HMPH!

123 123_growth_Enhanced1.wav おおー！ Wow!

125 125_growth_Level up1.wav まだまだ強くなるぞ！ I'M STILL GOING TO BE STRONG!
126 126_growth_Level up2.wav 向かうところ敵なーし！ YOU'RE THE ENEMY I'M GOING TO!

Picking up where Vol 8 left off, this one offers more common, everyday phrases useful for game dialog. Go ahead and give your female players even more things to chat about and expand their dialog!

* English translation list included

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM

short_description: Fill out your stories and dialog even further with Vol 9 of Japanese Anime Voices: Female Character Series!
